meanings.definition: To design (something) jointly or in collaboration with others.
meanings.sent1: We will codesign the project with our teammates.
meanings.sent2: It is important to codesign the new website for better results.
meanings.sent3: Let's codesign a surprise party for our friend next week!
meanings.sent4: Their minds codesign a beautiful future together.
meanings.sent5: The artists codesign a masterpiece that will inspire many.

meanings.definition: The act of designing something jointly or in collaboration with others.
meanings.sent1: Collaborative codesign leads to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent2: The codesign of the building involved multiple architects.
meanings.sent3: The codesign of the costume for the play was a fun group activity.
meanings.sent4: The codesign of the garden transformed it into a magical space.
meanings.sent5: Codesign allows for diverse perspectives to come together in creation.
